title: CodeForge
subtitle: Low-Code Next.js App Builder with AI

sections.aiFeaturesDescription: CodeForge integrates OpenAI across every designer to accelerate development:

overview: CodeForge is a comprehensive visual low-code platform for generating production-ready Next.js applications. It combines the power of visual designers with direct code editing, AI-powered generation, and a complete full-stack development toolkit.

features.title: Monaco Code Editor
features.description: Full-featured code editor with syntax highlighting, autocomplete, and AI-powered improvements

features.title: Prisma Schema Designer
features.description: Visual database model designer with automatic schema generation and AI assistance

features.title: Component Tree Builder
features.description: Hierarchical component structure builder with drag-and-drop and AI generation

features.title: Theme Designer
features.description: Material UI theme customizer with multiple variants, custom colors, and AI theme generation

features.title: Flask Backend Designer
features.description: Visual Python Flask API designer with blueprints, endpoints, and CORS configuration

features.title: Playwright Test Designer
features.description: E2E test builder with step configuration and AI test generation

features.title: Unit Test Designer
features.description: Comprehensive test suite builder for components, functions, hooks, and integration tests

features.title: Auto Error Repair
features.description: Automated error detection and AI-powered code repair system

features.title: Project Settings
features.description: Configure Next.js options, npm packages, scripts, and build settings

features.title: AI Integration
features.description: OpenAI-powered generation across all features for rapid development

gettingStarted.title: Create Your First Model
gettingStarted.description: Navigate to the Models tab and create your database schema using the visual designer or describe your data model to the AI.

gettingStarted.title: Design Your Components
gettingStarted.description: Use the Components tab to build your UI hierarchy visually or let the AI generate component structures based on your requirements.

gettingStarted.title: Customize Your Theme
gettingStarted.description: Head to the Styling tab to create custom color palettes, manage theme variants (light/dark), and configure typography.

gettingStarted.title: Build Your Backend
gettingStarted.description: Configure your Flask API in the Flask API tab by creating blueprints and endpoints with full CORS and authentication support.

gettingStarted.title: Export Your Project
gettingStarted.description: Click Export Project to generate all files including Next.js pages, Prisma schemas, Flask backend, tests, and configuration files ready for deployment.

aiFeatures.title: Complete App Generation
aiFeatures.description: Describe your application and get a full project structure with models, components, and styling

aiFeatures.title: Model Generation
aiFeatures.description: Generate Prisma models with fields and relations from natural language descriptions

aiFeatures.title: Component Creation
aiFeatures.description: Build complex React components with proper structure and Material UI integration

aiFeatures.title: Theme Generation
aiFeatures.description: Create beautiful, accessible color palettes that match your brand or description

aiFeatures.title: Test Generation
aiFeatures.description: Generate comprehensive E2E, unit, and integration tests with proper assertions

aiFeatures.title: Code Explanation
aiFeatures.description: Get detailed explanations of any code snippet to understand implementation details

aiFeatures.title: Code Improvement
aiFeatures.description: Automatically optimize code for performance, readability, and best practices

aiFeatures.title: Error Repair
aiFeatures.description: Automatically detect and fix syntax, type, import, and lint errors with context-aware fixes
